thread.title: Thornton
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Thornton

author: Thornton
title: Thornton
text: I have been using American Frame for years. For a reasonable price, somewhat lower than custom framing, I have had good results framing many items from prints to objects. Once I figured out the newer ordering software, it has been easy and the results have been accurate. A good change they made was providing frames pre assembled. Two key strengths I wanted to mention was 1) the complete product line which includes tools and accessories as well as a large selection of frames/mats and 2) the excellent job they do with packaging. I have never seen such a professional packaging job and the company stands behind their products with good customer service.
